H

handle(Request) - Method in class WebServer.myPlugin
 
handle(Request) - Method in class WebServer.naviPlugin
 
handle(Request) - Method in class WebServer.staticPlugin
Method to handle requests that got flagged for static plugin handling If the URL request equals the home page, the standard home webpage is created and send as response Next URL check id for Material Design Bootstrap - the layout of the page Alternatively if the requested URL is within the static directory the file search will also be started The requested file type gets determined.
handle(Request) - Method in class WebServer.tempPlugin
Create a connection to the sql db Check if an XML file is requested (getTemperature) if yes, determine the date from the url and make a prepared statement for the db send the results to the html constructor for XML creation and finally send a server response with the XML if no, all temperature entries in the db will be displayed as a table
handle(Request) - Method in class WebServer.toLowerPlugin
Differentiate between post and get requests - post means there is a text to be handled Decoding of special characters happens in the html construction cut off the "textfield=" part of the post request and set lower text Add correct headers and content
htmlConstructor - Class in WebServer
HTML Constructor Class
htmlConstructor() - Constructor for class WebServer.htmlConstructor
